channel.title: Moparscape Help / Java Help
channel.description: Guys, I need help, How do you CHANGE the EXP Amount that you get from something? I've got Shorty5855's Source and I want to change the Hay-Bales, Dummies, Door, Alter, Rune-Rock, Theif Table :confused: Any help would be apprieciated :P

item.title: Moparscape Help / Java Help
item.dc:creator: @barrows_ftw1 barrows ftw
item.description:
@barrows_ftw1 wrote:

geez thats easy… 1st go into your client.java and search for the thing you want to change such as a dummy search for case 823

case 823: if (actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("omg you root the doll."); setAnimation(1110); addSkillXP((370*playerLevel[0]), 0); addSkillXP((400*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((400*playerLevel[18]), 18); actionTimer = 20; } break;
looks like that. then change the 370 or the 400 to higher or lower depends how you want it.
note: 400 doesn’t mean 400xp so just play around with it for a while.

Read full topic
